## kernel5 variable

HOF subdiv kernel function for computing 2 split points from 5 source points, using weighted summation (thi.ng/vectors/addW5)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
kernel5: ([ua, ub, uc, ud, ue]: number[], [va, vb, vc, vd, ve]: number[]) => ([a, b, c, d, e]: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>[]) => import("@thi.ng/vectors").Vec[]
```
